experience: You and Deborah both know Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, Raoul Encinas, and 81 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017
Thankful for my time with an impressive group of Schwabbies earlier this week in Los Gatos and Sunnyvale, CA. Thanks for having me!

Manage change releases for multiple complex applications on various Mainframe and Distributed platforms. This includes coordination of our business partners, our Quality Assurance partners and our technology teams. Certified Scrum Master.Manage 40+ onsite and offsite Offshore contingency staff members.

Facilitation of the development of Principles, Policies and Standards within the technology organization. This includes appropriate governance for compliance to the standards and policies, exception reviews, new technology adoption reviews and communication/publication responsibilities.Facilitation of the Corporate Application Directory.

Monitor, schedule, review, approve and report on IT changes across all infrastructure platforms. Documention of processes and proceduresDeveloped training materials and was a trainer in regularly scheduled classes on Change Management Process Assist Clients in risk mitigation and in obtaining change approval

Contributed to the development of a new Producton Control team in the Technical Support unit of the IT department; included creating procedures, processes and hiring of staff. Supervisor, then Manager of the Tech Support team which included Change Management, Production Control,  Scheduling, and first-level operational tech support.

Roseanna Conlon, PMP, ITIL and COBiT
Process Manager, Project and Program Management
February 13, 2009, Deborah worked with Roseanna in different groups

I found working on a project with Roseanna was very easy; she is direct (in a non-offensive manner) in her communications and about her needs, which I find refreshing. Another of her strengths is her open-mindedness; she listens to people and takes action, which makes them feel heard.  I also noticed that she is a great decision-maker and doesn't let issues drag on. Roseanna also seems to pay close attention to others participation and provides recognition in a timely manner; again, she is innately aware of details and acts on them.
